welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Tubize, Belgium! We are excited to have you here and invite you to discover our charming city known for its picturesque scenery and friendly locals. Enjoy your stay and make unforgettable memories exploring Tubize!"

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: This terminal primarily serves international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: This terminal primarily serves domestic and regional flights.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: This terminal serves a mix of international and domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Charleroi Brussels South Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Charleroi Brussels South Airport, mainly used for low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the terminal, but it may be limited to a certain amount of time or data usage.
